site_name: Plot 14 Off Merchant Street, Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area, North West London
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 13 (Vehicle Dynamics Assessment) of Reserved Matters Approval 20/5609/RMA dated 10/03/2021 (as amended by 23/1877/NMA dated 28/06/2023, 23/5029/NMA dated 19/01/2024, 23/5439/NMA dated 08/04/2024, 24/4355/NMA dated 22/11/2024, and 24/4487/NMA dated 02/12/2024) in relation to Plot 14 and associated public realm (Neighbourhood Square) within the Phase 2 (South) (Plots) sub-phase of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area.
